DataElement.preferredName: Ulcerative Colitis Disease Activity Index Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The score for Ulcerative Colitis Disease Activity Index assessment, which is a four-item instrument that utilizes a four-point rating scale to assess the severity of ulcerative colitis based on stool frequency, rectal bleeding, mucosal appearance at endoscopy, and physician rating of disease activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Ulcerative Colitis Disease Activity Index Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A four-item instrument that utilizes a four-point rating scale to assess the severity of ulcerative colitis based on stool frequency, rectal bleeding, mucosal appearance at endoscopy, and physician rating of disease activity._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A four-item instrument that utilizes a four-point rating scale to assess the severity of ulcerative colitis based on stool frequency, rectal bleeding, mucosal appearance at endoscopy, and physician rating of disease activity.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.
